title: Kumb Space
content:
1. What is “KUMB”?  Kumb is a decentralized, autonomous project developed by community dissidents on the mainstream market and the Kumb team, followed entirely by community driven, based on a token issued on the BSC chain. Kumb is a phenomenon that accidentally broke monopolies and redivided wealth, a token that truly belongs to the masses.{:height=”10” width=”10”}
2. How is “Kumb” assigned?  The total number of Kumb tokens will be (xxxxx%), which will be distributed in a 100% fair way. The Kumb development team will not reserve any single token, nor will there be any so-called investors or early participants.
3. On the future of “Kumb”
Q1: Completed the development of the main functions of KUMB and launched it.
Q2: fair start, seeking partnerships with listed exchanges: CoinMarket-Cap, Coingecko, Blockfolio
Q3: Listed on centralized exchanges, including MXC, Hotbit, Kucoin…
Q4: Optimized and launched the Kumb Dex platform.

4. Buy Now

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post"

More info: Writing
Run server$ hexo server

More info: Server
Generate static files$ hexo generate

More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy

More info: Deployment
